languages.text: "Маршал Стракс сейчас не на Даргонусе, поэтому он поручил мне говорить от своего имени — иначе говоря, не терять времени в поимке еретика. Разумеется, он представится вам лично, когда вернется на ваш столичный мир".

"Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."
languages.original_text: "Маршал Стракс сейчас не на Даргонусе, поэтому он поручил мне говорить от своего имени — иначе говоря, не терять времени в поимке еретика. Разумеется, он представится вам лично, когда вернется на ваш столичный мир".

traits.locale_text: "Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."

"Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."

languages.text: «El Mariscal Strachs no se encuentra en Dargonus en este momento, por lo que me ha designado a mí como su portavoz. No podemos perder tiempo para capturar a los herejes. No me cabe duda de que se presentará ante usted en cuanto regrese a su mundo capital».
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."

traits.locale_text: «El Mariscal Strachs no se encuentra en Dargonus en este momento, por lo que me ha designado a mí como su portavoz. No podemos perder tiempo para capturar a los herejes. No me cabe duda de que se presentará ante usted en cuanto regrese a su mundo capital».

languages.text: “斯塔克斯元帅目前不在达戈努斯，因此他任命我担任他的发言人。异端分子正在逍遥法外，时间一分一秒都不能耽误。我相信，当他回到你的首都世界之后，一定会亲自与你见面。”
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."

traits.locale_text: “斯塔克斯元帅目前不在达戈努斯，因此他任命我担任他的发言人。异端分子正在逍遥法外，时间一分一秒都不能耽误。我相信，当他回到你的首都世界之后，一定会亲自与你见面。”

languages.text: « Le maréchal Strachs ne se trouve pas sur Dargonus à l'heure actuelle, raison pour laquelle il m'a désigné comme émissaire. Le temps presse, la chasse aux hérétiques ne souffre aucun délai. Je suis sûr qu'il viendra vous voir dès qu'il sera de retour sur le monde-capitale. »
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."

traits.locale_text: « Le maréchal Strachs ne se trouve pas sur Dargonus à l'heure actuelle, raison pour laquelle il m'a désigné comme émissaire. Le temps presse, la chasse aux hérétiques ne souffre aucun délai. Je suis sûr qu'il viendra vous voir dès qu'il sera de retour sur le monde-capitale. »

languages.text: 「ストラッチス将帥は現在ダルゴナスにはいないので、彼の名のもとに私が話すことになりました。異端者を捕まえるためには時間が重要です。彼があなたの首都惑星に戻り次第、必ず自らお目にかかるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."

traits.locale_text: 「ストラッチス将帥は現在ダルゴナスにはいないので、彼の名のもとに私が話すことになりました。異端者を捕まえるためには時間が重要です。彼があなたの首都惑星に戻り次第、必ず自らお目にかかるでしょう」

languages.text: "Miralay Strachs şu anda Dargonus'ta olmadığından onun adına konuşmam için beni görevlendirdi. Söz konusu kâfir yakalamaksa kaybedecek vakit yoktur. Başdünyana döner dönmez huzurunuza çıkacağından eminim."
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."

traits.locale_text: "Miralay Strachs şu anda Dargonus'ta olmadığından onun adına konuşmam için beni görevlendirdi. Söz konusu kâfir yakalamaksa kaybedecek vakit yoktur. Başdünyana döner dönmez huzurunuza çıkacağından eminim."

languages.text: "Da Marschall Strachs derzeit nicht auf Dargonus ist, hat er mich autorisiert, in seinem Namen zu sprechen ... die Zeit drängt, wenn es gilt, einen Ketzer festzusetzen. Ich bin sicher, er wird Euch persönlich aufsuchen, sobald er auf Eure Hauptwelt zurückkehrt."
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."

languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs is not on Dargonus at present, so he appointed me to speak on his behalf — time is of the essence when there is a heretic to catch. I am sure he will present himself to you as soon as he returns to your capital world."
